author: R. Jun
title: Watch: Sam Kim Performs Beautiful Acoustic Rendition Of Sam Smith's "Stay With Me" | Soompi
text: Pin Display.Sharethrough.Soompi.1x1 On the February 3 broadcast of “Lee Hong Ki’s Kiss the Radio,” Sam Kim appeared as a guest. During the show, Sam Kim performed an acoustic rendition of Sam Smith’s “Stay With Me,” slowing the song down for added emotion, complete with a beautiful guitar solo. Watch the performance:
